channel.title: Need a Client/Server with this:
channel.description:
[b]FIRST OF ALL, A MOD TOLD ME TO POST IT HERE.... SO I WILL!! Don't lock please..[/b]
Well, i've seen a lot of people say they have the new Elite TT items on their server. (from 317 to 508)
I'd like to know if anyone released a server with the new Elite TT items? (from 317 to 508)
Please reply. Telling me the name of the server PLEASE.
If you really can, post the link to the topic? ?

item.title: Need a Client/Server with this:
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I did not say “post your question in the downloads section.” I said if you need a server go to the download section. Which means look through the topics in the section and find one you like and download it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Client/Server with this:
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Requesting server’s is not allowed sorry, also nobody told you that; Do not lie to yourself.
You guy’s do know that multiple posting on a topic like this is considered a offense?

[quote=“The Soul, post:1355, topic:249774”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=329269.msg3300499#msg3300499 date=1281273179]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=329269.msg3300295#msg3300295 date=1281248903]

And even if the staff are sleeping why can’t you all just report, and leave the topics alone after that? It takes more then just moderators locking post/deleteing post/giving warnings/etc to keep a forum in tact, the members got to help out too.
[/quote]THANK YOU!

This is completely true. You all rely on us while remaining willingly oblivious to the report feature. You’re also the ones causing the problems for us to fix! So if you’re making problems for the community, why are you complaining!?
[/quote]There should be 1 person saying this is not allowed and reporting then nobody else should reply; as when they do it bumps the topic and spam occur’s. It takes a little bit of common sense from everybody

To be honest, we should start infracting people who create the repetition as it’s considered spam.[/quote]

Read full topic
